products.title: Sponsored Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5i Laptop, 16" IPS 60Hz, Intel Core 5 120U, 16GB, 512GB SSD (133 Reviews) Top Deal $779 $779.00 SAVE $381 Plus $1.00 EHF Available online only
products.description:
Tackle everyday tasks with Intel® Core™ processors

·Lightweight design for on-the-go use

·Experience dazzling detail & vivid colours on a high-resolution display.

·AI-enhanced user experience

· Always Ready To Tag Along

The lightweight IdeaPad Slim 5i (16″ Intel) is perfect for take-anywhere adventures. Lightweight and sleek, this laptop matches your style and personality with two shades to choose from. Go for the elegant Cloud Grey or understated Abyss Blue in a full metal finishing.

Lets Everything You Do Fly

Effortlessly breeze through everyday tasks with speedy performance from Intel® Core™ processors. Thanks to plenty of memory and storage, you can access your content in a snap. Plus, the IdeaPad Slim 5i features Smart Power to bring optimal performance, battery, and cooling abilities for whatever you’re running.

It’s Clearly Brilliant

Every scene is more immersive and fuller on the spacious display of the IdeaPad Slim 5i. Featuring a stunning display with an expansive active aspect ratio and paired with Dolby Audio™-certified dual speakers, the optional touchscreen display will bring your favourite content to life. And with TÜV Low Blue Light, you won’t have to worry about straining your eyes during work sessions and entertainment marathons.

Go-anywhere Productivity

With the IdeaPad Slim 5i laptop’s full-HD conferencing tools, a wide range of ports, and an all-day battery that recharges in a breeze, productivity can happen anywhere. And with just one touch of the fingerprint sensor, you can get everything started in a flash. Don’t forget the two full-function USB-C ports that allow you to expand your workflows, charge accessories, and transfer large files in a snap.

Slim Frame, Sturdy Design

The IdeaPad Slim 5i laptop’s slim design doesn’t compromise strength. Engineered with outstanding toughness to meet the exacting standards of MIL-STD-810H, this military-grade device is ready to take on any hits that life throws at you.

Make Every Day Smarter

Accelerate your ambitions on the IdeaPad Slim 5i with Lenovo AI Engine—an ecosystem of AI-powered features designed to deliver a more intuitive experience for work and play.

A Lasting Commitment

Your commitment to environmental sustainability starts with your PC’s energy conservation and recycled content. The product ships with a packaging cushion that contains 90% recycled plastic, built with 90% post-consumer recycled plastic in the power adapter case, and 90% ocean-bound plastic in the system bag. Registered EPEAT®* Gold and ENERGY STAR® certified, it fulfils the highest environmental performance criteria on product longevity, circular design, and energy efficiency. *EPEAT-registered where applicable—see www.epeat.net for registration status by country.

Specifications may vary depending upon region / model.
products.llm_summary: The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5i offers a well-rounded balance of performance, portability, and features, comparable to other slim laptops in its class, such as the Dell Inspiron or HP Envy series. Its pricing is competitive, making it a consideration for those seeking a reliable, everyday laptop.

The AMD Ryzen 7 processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 graphics card provide fast processing and smooth graphics, while the 16GB DDR5 RAM and 512GB SSD ensure efficient multitasking and fast loading times. products.title: Sponsored ASUS Zenbook DUO 14" OLED Touchscreen Laptop - Grey (Intel Core Ultra 7 EVO/1TB SSD/16GB RAM) - En (54 Reviews) Top Deal $1499.99 $1,499.99 SAVE $699 Plus $0.40 EHF Available to ship Availab
products.description:
Intel Core Ultra 7 155H processor and 16GB LPDDR5X RAM combine to deliver exceptionally powerful performance
1TB solid state drive provides more storage space for your files and media
Two full-size 14-inch OLED touchscreen displays with 1920 x 1200 resolution significantly enhance your convenience and visual experience
Integrated Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) (dual band) 2x2 and Bluetooth 5.3 wireless card offer provisions for highly efficient wireless networking
Lithium-ion battery with 75Wh capacity offers hours of video play in both laptop and dual screen modes
Fast-Charge technology lets you charge the laptop quickly
One audio jack, one HDMI 2.1, one USB 3.2 Gen1 Type-A, two Thunderbolt 4 USB-C, and one USB Type-C on detachable keyboard provide multiple options for connecting external devices
Full HD IR webcam with ASUS AiSense technology allows for quick face login and provides exceptional image quality
Sophisticated super-liner speakers deliver loud, crisp, and clear sound
Meets MIL-STD 810H military standards for superior durability
Windows Copilot, an AI-powered assistant, helps improve your creativity and productivity
Four modes namely laptop, desktop, dual screen, and sharing, offer great versatility to work conveniently in different settings
Preinstalled with Windows 11 Home operating system that features easy user interface, enhanced performance, and improved security

products.title: Sponsored Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 Intel 14" IPS Ultrabook Laptop, Intel Core Ultra 7 165U, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, Windows 11 Pro, 21KC004AUS (622 Reviews) Top Deal $2249 $2,249.00 SAVE $2,750 Ava
products.description:
14″ industry-leading, ultraportable coworker for on-the-go

·Powered by Intel® Core™ Ultra processors, with integrated AI

·All-day battery life, instant wake, & Intel® Unison™

·Dolby Voice®, Dolby Atmos®, & Zoom-certified

·Recycled post-industrial & post-consumer content used

· How Do You Show Respect for the Planet?

The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 (14ʺ Intel) laptop still uses carbon fibre for the chassis — but better yet some of that carbon fibre is recycled from post-industrial remnants and is used along with 90% recycled magnesium. Plus, the chassis, the battery pack, the speaker enclosure, and the power adapter all include recycled post-consumer content. And we don’t stop there. The packaging is 100% plastic-free and comprised in part with rapid-renewable materials made from bamboo-sugar-cane fibre.

Elevated Performance & Lasting Battery

The ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 boasts the world’s first laptop powered by Intel® Core™ Ultra processors, making it ideal for creating and on-the-go productivity. Enjoy optimized performance with workloads pushed to dedicated AI engines, including the low-power neural processing unit (NPU) for sustained tasks and resilient battery life. Go ahead, turn on auto-framing or low-light enhancement for your online meetings, even when unplugged! Choose the Intel vPro® Evo™ Edition, for multilayer security, professional-grade performance, reliable stability, and complete management for IT.

Raise the Bar on Collaboration

A Communications Bar, positioned at the top of the display for easy laptop opening, houses two cameras (FHD / infrared (IR)) — or upgrade to the premium 8MP & IR Mobile Industry Processor Interface (MIPI) with Computer Vision — both options include a webcam privacy shutter. Additionally, two 360-degree mics with AI-based noise cancellation, combined with Dolby Voice® and Dolby Atmos® deliver a superb audio experience. Plus, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 is Zoom-certified. Make calls, listen to music, or watch a video and enjoy the sublime sounds.

You Spoke. We Listened: We’ve Redesigned Our Legendary Keyboard

Our redesigned ThinkPad keyboard now includes tactile markings to help people with visual impairments more easily find the correct keys. We’ve moved the fingerprint reader to the keyboard, resulting in a larger sensor for a better experience. Plus, our TrackPad is even larger now, at 120mm / 4.72ʺ. Our beloved red TrackPoint still lets you navigate —  but with a double tap, it opens the ThinkPad TrackPoint Quick Menu to optimize audio-visuals, set alerts against muting, and even take notes with the Dictation Toolbar for handy speech-to-text transcription.

A Feast for the Eyes

Razor-thin bezels frame an optional stunning 14ʺ 2.8K OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate. Sharp, clear details make content pop and colours more vibrant than ever on the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 laptop. But perhaps the best part yet? It’s easy on the eyes with Eyesafe® certification, so you can put in the
products.llm_summary: This laptop offers all-day battery life, instant wake, and optimized performance for on-the-go productivity, making it ideal for creating, video conferencing, and general use. The Intel Core Ultra processor and dedicated AI engine provide a smooth experience, while the 14" IPS display and Dolby Audio deliver excellent visuals and sound. The laptop's design, including a redesigned keyboard and large TrackPad, prioritizes usability and accessibility.

Certified by TUV Rheinland for low blue light, ensuring eye protection during extended use

One USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, one USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, one USB 2.0 Type-A, a HDMI 1.4, and a combo audio jack offer more options for connecting external devices (USB transfer speed may vary. Learn more at the ASUS website)
180-degree hinge, ASUS ErgoSense chiclet keyboard with a numeric keypad, optimal click ratio, and a larger multi-finger touchpad significantly enhance your work efficiency
ASUS AI noise cancellation technology uses machine learning to separate unwanted noise from human speech, ensuring your voice is heard clearly during conference calls
Fingerprint sensor and an HD camera with a privacy shutter improve security
ASUS Antimicrobial Guard Plus (disclaimer: learn more at the ASUS website) protects frequently touched surfaces for improved hygiene
Weighing just 1.88kg (4.14lb.) and measuring only 1.99cm (0.78") in thickness, it offers exceptional mobility and a seamless finish for a smooth touch experience
Preloaded with Windows 11 Home operating system that features easy user interface
products.llm_summary: Experience unparalleled productivity and immersive entertainment with the ASUS Vivobook 16, featuring lightning-fast performance and stunning visuals. Elevate your work and play with this sleek, powerful laptop, now available at an unbeatable price.
